conversations.body_text: 你好，Alvaro Farelo Moncayo，  您需要购买 PlusX 控制器、24V 直流电源和 VAM Pro 电机。如果您已经拥有电机，则无需再次购买。我们的系统目前支持十余款主流赛车游戏，并兼容最新版本的 SIMHUB (9.9.3)，该版本为 100 余款赛车游戏提供遥测支持。            https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor

Okey, so i just need to buy haptics no need to buy a controller box? I send
you a photo of my controller box so pls tell me what I need to buy in order
to make it work.


Thanks for the help,
Alvaro







El mié, 2 jul 2025, 4:25 p. m., service@simsonn.com

Hi Alvaro farelo moncayo,    If you are using the ProX pedals (not the latest ProX Ultra or PlusX), please go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update in the SIMSONN Manager 2.0.8 software. In the PESALS-Firmware/pedals directory, select the prox.sfu file to update the firmware. After the update is complete, your pedals will support the VAM Pro motor.
